entry.title: $2600 // Stunning 1 Bedroom on 89th & Riverside
entry.content:
Hello! We are looking for someone to takeover the lease on March 1 (not a sublet, you would be taking on the lease) for our absolutely beautiful true 1 bedroom on the upper west side. One flight up with huge windows that let in tons of light, responsive landlord, decorative fireplace, back of the building so very quiet. Newly renovated and clean, we've been here two years and would gladly stay longer if we could. You are literal steps to Riverside Park, the nicest park in Manhattan. 5 minute walk to the 1 train at 86th and 7 minutes to the 2/3 at 96th (93rd St entrance!). Amazing local restaurants and grocery stores.

The building is pet friendly upon approval (we have a dog and had no issues!)

40 times the rent required by our landlord. If you are interested in viewing the apartment please email your availability in the next week or two.

entry.title: $2400 // PRIME UWS~ALL NEW 1BR~HIGH CEILINGS~LAUNDRY~SUPER
entry.content:
Gut Renovated Queen Size 1br in Prime Upper West - Mid 80's & Amsterdam
Apartment Feature a Large Open Living Room with High Ceilings and Oversize Windows.
Bedroom can easily fit a queen size bed with room for more furniture.
Separate kitchen with Granite Counter and Stainless Steel Appliances.
Windows In all Rooms!
Apartment is located on the First floor.
Well Maintained Walk Up with Laundry In the Building. Quite Tree-Line-Block!

To view, please email with your contact info
